availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William B. Clark (Simpson County, Ky, prov govt com rep)

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, member of the provisional government convention. Virginia native. Married to Eliza B. Clark. Resident of Simpson County in 1850. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, City/District, p. 69B.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, District 150, p. 17B.
KYR-0004-033-0001.
